name: MEC Gateway Lead Tights - Women's
description:
Move freely at the crag, gym, or along the trail. The fabric is woven instead of knit to resist abrasion better. Multiple drop-in pockets keep small items handy when you're at a hanging belay. Great for climbing, yoga or hiking, these tights are your gateway to good times outside (or inside).Stretch woven nylon and spandex is durable enough for climbing and hiking.Wide yoga pants-style waistband is comfortable under a harness or hipbelt.Internal drawcord ensures they won't slip out of place.Drop-in stretch pockets on the hips and back of waistband store your phone, lip balm, keys and other small essentials.Gusseted crotch and stretchy fabric ensure room to move.7/8-style with a 25-inch inseam.

        Sustainability
